name: Checkerboard Canyon
description:
Introduction

There are 10-15 rappels and an equal number of notable down-climbs. The approach is long, exposed and off-trail. The exit is 7 miles down the Narrows and out the Temple of Sinawava. All upstream travel beyond Big Springs is prohibited; exiting up the North Fork may result in a citation.

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape

Entry to this area may be restricted; check for information regarding permits before attempting this trip

Trip reports and media

EVEN-FURTHER CHECKERBOARD CANYON

Background

properties.name: wChekrbdRP-01
properties.description: Sandstone out croppings start to show up in the drainage. (Data by bluugnome.com)

properties.name: R1
properties.description: Rap 1 - Checkerboard Canyon. Anchored from two bolted hangers RDC about head high and drops about 180 feet down a mostly vertical wall. (Data by bluugnome.com)

properties.name: R2
properties.description: Rap 2 anchored from a rock imbedded in a pothole about 10 feet back and drops about 30 feet down a sloped wall to a gravel filled pothole. (Data by bluugnome.com)

properties.name: R3
properties.description: Rap 3 starts at the bottom of rap 2; is anchored from logs and drops over 3 stages with a total rope travel of about 100 feet. Stages are 15; 20 and 45 feet over potholes. (Data by bluugnome.com)

properties.name: Start of Down Climb Section
properties.description: Start of a series of down climbs of 4 to 10 feet each. First down climb is challenging and may need meat anchor from top. (Data by bluugnome.com)

properties.name: R4
properties.description: Rap 4 - Checkerboard Canyon. Anchored from a rock embedded in the wash at the top of the drop and drops about 20 feet into a narrow deep winding slot. (Data by bluugnome.com)

properties.name: wChekrbdRP-04
properties.description: Down climb of about 8 feet over a large choke stone boulder with an awkward overhang. This is the start of the second narrow section. (Data by bluugnome.com)

properties.name: R5
properties.description: Rap 5 - Checkerboard Canyon. Anchored from either the red boulder at the top of the drop or a log embedded in the dirt about 8 feet back from the drop. Rap is done as a 2 stage rap with stages of 15 and 20 feet and about 35 feet of horizontal wash between them and total rope travel of about 75 feet. (Data by bluugnome.com)

properties.name: R6
properties.description: Rap 6 - Checkerboard Canyon. Anchored from a dead man anchor or from a pinch point at the top of the drop between a boulder and canyon wall RDC. Rap 6 drops about 25 feet. (Data by bluugnome.com)

properties.name: wChekrbdRP-05
properties.description: First of two slide down climbs before getting to the end of the second narrow section. (Data by bluugnome.com)

properties.name: R7
properties.description: Rap 7 - Checkerboard Canyon. Anchored LDC from choke stones and drops about 20 feet down a sloped wall. (Data by bluugnome.com)

properties.name: wChekrbdRP-09
properties.description: Start of the fourth narrows and is the end of long flat open wash walk. This is about 80 feet down canyon of a tall lone tree in the wash. (Data by bluugnome.com)

properties.name: R8
properties.description: Rap 8 - Checkerboard Canyon. Anchored from logs jammed at the top of the rap and drops about 20 feet to a wiast deep pool. (Data by bluugnome.com)

properties.name: R9
properties.description: Rap 9 - Checkerboard Canyon. Anchored from logs and drops about 25 feet down over a large over hanging boulder. (Data by bluugnome.com)

properties.name: R10
properties.description: Rap 10 - Checkerboard Canyon. Anchored LDC from a choke stone in a small side ravine about 10 feet back and drops about 35 feet down a sloped fluted wall to a pool about waist deep. (Data by bluugnome.com)

properties.name: R11
properties.description: Rap 11 - Checkerboard Canyon. Anchored from a log jammed in boulders about 25 feet back from the drop and drops about 35 feet inot the fifth and final narrows. (Data by bluugnome.com)

properties.name: R12
properties.description: Rap 12 - Checkerboard Canyon. Anchored from a log and has a total drop of about 80 feet down a winding slot that you can not see the bottom of from the top of the rap. All but last person can rap entire length. Last person should pull ropes from part way down the drop then down climb. See route description for details. (Data by bluugnome.com)

properties.name: R13
properties.description: Rap 13 - Checkerboard Canyon. Anchored from 2 bolted hangers and drops about 200 feet down a very fun and scenic fluuted wall to a sandy area with a pool that can be a swimmer for a few feet if full. (Data by bluugnome.com)

properties.name: wChekrbdRP-08
properties.description: End of third narrow section. As the narrow section ends the canyon makes a sharp left right jog just before getting to the the long straight open wash walk. (Data by bluugnome.com)

properties.name: wChekrbdRP-07
properties.description: Start of the third narrows where the canyon turns sharp right as it passes a drainage joining in from LDC. (Data by bluugnome.com)

properties.name: wChekrbdRP-06
properties.description: End of second narrows where the canyon opens a little and turns sharp left as a drainage joins in from RDC. (Data by bluugnome.com)

properties.name: wChekrbdRP-03
properties.description: End of first narrow slot and is where large drainages join in from both sides. (Data by bluugnome.com)

properties.name: Zion Canyon Shuttle Bus
properties.description: Zion Canyon Shuttle Bus
